Are you sure you want to delete %s from database? Name too long! One of the entered names is too long! End game turn indicator V 1.0 

NineCells is a simple and casual game where you try to match the boxes on the grid either vertically , horizontally or diagonally.


Features:
 *Playing Modes: Single-player and Multi-player modes

 *Database storage for up to 10 players

 *Smart AI-agent (Randy V1.0) show list delete_image
